立不教，¶
坐不議，¶
虛而往，¶
實而歸。¶

# dating: 8110

象耳目，¶

# dating: 8110
聞之曰：¶
『鑑明則塵垢不止，¶	KR2c0021_074:24a:5:21:1,KR2d0023_015:30b:5:1:14,KR3k0025_042:30b:8:6:16,KR3k0045_091:8a:5:1:3,KR4h0062_038:13b:5:9:15,KR4h0139_173:35a:5:3:19,KR5c0079_007:031b:9:4:9,KR5c0079_011:010a:5:4:3,KR5c0113_006:002a:5:9:3,KR5c0126_005:1a:87:1:10,KR5c0127_010:012a:4:5:35,KR5c0128_007:008a:6:5:3,KR5c0134_002:002b:6:5:2,KR5c0135_006:005a:7:1:8,KR5c0136_004:008a:4:15:14,KR5c0138_002:23a:2:15:5,KR5h0057_002:030b:3:7:2,KR5i0036_002:02p048a:5:22:20,KR6s0075_003:0420b:6:23:54

久與賢人處則无過。』¶	KR5c0126_005:1a:89:1:10

而猶出言若是，¶	KR2c0021_074:24a:6:9:1,KR2d0023_015:30b:6:20:14,KR3k0056_150:41a:2:35:11,KR5c0126_005:1a:91:1:10,KR5c0127_010:012a:6:1:35,KR5c0128_007:008a:8:1:3,KR5c0134_002:002b:8:1:2,KR5c0135_006:005b:2:1:9,KR5c0136_004:008a:6:11:14,KR5c0138_002:23a:3:19:5,KR5c0139_006:014a:9:1:17,KR5h0057_002:030b:5:3:2,KR5i0036_002:02p048a:7:1:20,KR6q0221_030:0773a:23:3:8,KR6s0075_003:0420b:8:10:54

# dating: 8110
子產曰：¶
「子既若是矣，¶	KR2c0021_074:24a:6:22:1,KR2d0023_015:30b:7:7:14,KR5c0126_005:1a:94:1:11,KR5c0127_010:012a:6:14:35,KR5c0128_007:008a:8:14:3,KR5c0134_002:002b:8:14:2,KR5c0135_006:005b:4:4:9,KR5c0138_002:23a:4:26:5,KR5c0139_006:014b:6:4:18,KR5h0057_002:030b:5:16:2,KR6q0219_001:0034a:11:4:312,KR6q0221_030:0773a:24:11:8,KR6s0075_003:0420b:10:22:54

「子无乃稱！」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_005-6a>¶	KR5c0126_005:1a:117:1:13

# dating: 8110
魯有兀者叔山无趾，¶	KR4d0086_007:11b:12:7:3,KR5c0126_005:1a:118:1:14
踵見仲尼。¶	KR1a0082_005:22b:1:27:13,KR2b0017_073:2b:3:11:1,KR2c0021_086:273b:5:18:16,KR3k0012_607:3a:11:11:4,KR3k0012_999:3a:11:11:12980,KR3k0039_018:39a:1:36:4,KR4d0086_003:11b:7:12:9,KR4d0086_005:35b:4:15:39,KR4d0394_004:27b:1:7:14,KR5c0126_005:1a:119:1:14,KR5c0127_011:001a:4:9:2,KR5c0128_007:010a:4:9:3,KR5c0134_002:003a:10:9:3,KR5c0135_006:007a:5:1:10,KR5c0136_004:009b:9:9:16,KR5c0138_002:24a:6:15:5,KR5c0139_006:018b:5:9:22,KR5h0057_002:033a:1:9:2,KR5i0036_002:02p048b:9:1:20,KR6q0221_030:0773b:1:16:8,KR6s0075_003:0421b:5:9:56
仲尼曰：¶「子不謹，¶	KR2b0017_073:2b:3:15:1,KR2c0021_086:273b:6:2:16,KR3k0012_607:3a:11:15:4,KR3k0012_999:3a:11:15:12980,KR4c0048_043:30b:3:11:91,KR4d0086_003:11b:7:16:9,KR4d0394_004:27b:1:11:14,KR5c0126_005:1a:120:1:14,KR5c0127_011:001a:4:13:2,KR5c0128_007:010a:4:13:3,KR5c0134_002:003a:10:13:3,KR5c0135_006:007a:5:5:10,KR5c0136_004:009b:9:13:16,KR5c0138_002:24a:7:5:5,KR5c0139_006:018b:10:1:22,KR5h0057_002:033a:1:13:2,KR5i0036_002:02p048b:9:10:20,KR6q0221_030:0773b:1:20:8,KR6s0075_003:0421b:5:11:56
前既犯患若是矣。¶	KR2b0017_073:2b:3:21:1,KR2c0021_086:273b:6:8:16,KR4c0048_043:30b:3:17:91,KR5c0126_005:1a:122:1:14,KR5c0127_011:001a:5:1:2,KR5c0128_007:010a:5:2:3,KR5c0134_002:003b:1:2:3,KR5c0135_006:007a:5:11:10,KR5c0138_002:24a:7:11:5,KR5c0139_006:018b:10:7:22,KR5h0057_002:033a:2:2:2,KR6s0075_003:0421b:5:17:56
雖今來，何及矣！」¶	KR2b0017_073:2b:4:7:1,KR2c0021_086:273b:6:15:16,KR3k0012_607:3a:12:5:4,KR3k0012_999:3a:12:5:12980,KR4c0048_043:30b:3:24:91,KR4d0086_003:11b:8:8:9,KR5c0126_005:1a:123:1:14,KR5c0127_011:001a:5:8:2,KR5c0128_007:010a:5:9:3,KR5c0134_002:003b:1:9:3,KR5c0135_006:007a:6:1:10,KR5c0136_004:009b:10:9:16,KR5c0138_002:24a:7:18:5,KR5c0139_006:018b:10:14:22,KR5h0057_002:033a:2:9:2,KR5i0036_002:02p048b:9:25:20

无趾曰：¶

# dating: 8110

惡用知？¶
不斲，¶
惡用膠？¶

惡用商？¶
四者，¶
天鬻也。¶
